import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import classes from './PlayerSection.module.css' class PlayerSection extends React.Component { state = { id : 1, data : '' } componentDidMount() { } shouldComponentUpdate(nextProps, nextState, nextContext) { if(this.state.id != nextProps.location.pathname.split('/')[1]) { this.setState((prevState) => { if(prevState.id == 1) return false return {id: this.props.location.pathname.split('/')[1]} }) return true } return true } render() { return (
) } } export default PlayerSection
